alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Holt (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 2:25PM CDT until July 05 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Holt County in north central Nebraska... Boyd County in north central Nebraska... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 224 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Gross to 9 miles southwest of Naper, moving south at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Spencer, Butte, Lynch, Naper, Gross, Bristow, Dustin, Anoka, Redbird State Wildlife Management Area, Hull Lake State Wildlife Management Area, Spencer Dam, Parshall Bridge State Wildlife Management Area and Anncar. This includes the following highways... Highway 281 between mile markers 202 and 223. Highway 12 between mile markers 87 and 139. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Wind damage with these storms will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
